resources.string: Hi, my name is Gabby Burgard. I made this app to help keep folks informed about abortion policies in their state. Given all of the opacity going on lately, I figured we all could use a bit more transparency. Please don\'t hesitate to email me if you notice something that needs changing or have something useful to add.
Need help funding your reproductive health choice? Click here- https://abortionfunds.org/need-abortion/
Need help finding a place to exercise your reproductive health choice? Click here- https://www.abortionfinder.org/
Feeling a bit confused about the abortion pill? Click here- https://www.abortionfinder.org/abortion-types/pill
Feeling a bit confused about the abortion procedure/surgery? Click here- https://www.abortionfinder.org/abortion-types/procedure
